casebody.data:
CHAVEZ
v.
WADLINGTON 366A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 4, 2018 Rebecca K. Watts, Attorney at Law, Monroe, for Chavez, Emily Susanna. Joseph Wadlington, for Wadlington, Joseph Fitzgerald. Serena Wadlington, for Wadlington, Serena Sebring.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 4th of December 2018 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of December 2018."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 10th day of December 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
